en: So, keep an open mind - I know this doesn't quite suit the vision you had for your project. However, I conducted a bit of a survey. It turns out one of our niche audiences really wants to see this feature in your product.
I know it might confuse the average user, but these niche users would be avid, loyal fans if we added this. What do you think?
Better to appear to a niche than to make something no one truly loves, eh?
I guess focusing on a wider audience isn't the worst idea.
